import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get asset summary statistics"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/analytics/asset/{AssetId}/summary-stats"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns aggregated ticket statistics for a specific asset. This endpoint is ideal for asset detail pages, showing the ticket history and service activity for the asset.

**Statistics Returned**:
- **OpenTickets**: Currently open tickets for this asset
- **TotalTickets**: All-time ticket count
- **ClosedTickets**: Completed/closed tickets
- **AssignedTickets**: Tickets assigned related to this asset
- **Devices**: Related device count

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to search for assets and capture `Items[].AssetId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) → extract `Items[0].AssetId`
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/analytics/asset/\{AssetId\}/summary-stats](/docs/api/analytics/get-asset-summary-stats) to retrieve summary statistics
3. Display the statistics on an asset detail page or service history panel

**Minimal Required Fields**: `AssetId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"AssetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the asset to retrieve statistics for.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"7b8c9d0e-1f2a-3b4c-5d6e-7f8a9b0c1d2e","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchAssets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets/search","responseField":"Items[].AssetId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

</RequestSchema>
